name: Bristle
headline: At-home oral health testing, coaching & care

founders.name: Brian Maurer, Founder
founders.description:
Co-Founder and commercial lead for Bristle. Background in Genomics sales and marketing (past: Illumina, Twist Bioscience). Passionate about translating advanced genomic technologies into healthcare solutions for patients and providers. 

Hobbies: All things music, hiking, science-fiction/self-help books, and travel

founders.name: Shivam Patel, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Bristle leading finance, ops, and partnerships

generated_description:
**Bristle: Revolutionizing Oral Health**

Founded in 2020, Bristle is a San Francisco-based startup that's redefining how we think about oral health. As part of the Y Combinator W21 batch, the company is on a mission to provide at-home oral health testing, personalized coaching, and comprehensive care strategies. 

Bristle offers an innovative service that allows users to track the health of their mouths right from the comfort of their homes. Their flagship offering is an oral health test that analyzes saliva samples for an extensive range of bacteria, fungi, and viruses, helping users pinpoint issues like bad breath, gum inflammation, and chronic tooth decay. This is all about getting to the root of oral health problems before they escalate into serious conditions.

For just $169, customers receive a test kit that’s shipped directly to them, allowing for easy sample collection and return. Once analyzed, results are paired with actionable reports and support from certified oral hygiene coaches, who provide tailored advice and solutions based on individual needs.

With a lean team of six passionate individuals, Bristle is already making strides in the consumer health services and telemedicine sectors, embodying a robust vision for more personalized health management. They are led by Jared Friedman, a Group Partner within the Y Combinator ecosystem, which suggests a strong backing for their ambitious goals.

By leveraging the expertise of dental professionals and incorporating modern technology, Bristle not only aims to simplify identifying oral health issues but also to empower users with knowledge and personalized care plans. 

With over 10,000 satisfied members and an impressive 4.84-star rating, it seems Bristle is onto something. As we move toward a future where individual health management becomes the norm, Bristle is positioned as a trailblazer in the space of oral health. 

For those looking to take charge of their oral well-being, Bristle offers a compelling solution that combines scientific insight and everyday practicality—because good health really does start with a healthy mouth. You can learn more and check them out at [Bristle Health](https://bristlehealth.com/).
